title: Welcome to Finland’s national foresight network!
content: The Foresight.fi site was born out of our quest to bring the latest foresight cooperation and topical events within your reach. This may not be the first time that you come across Foresight.fi, for it has existed before. On this reopened website, you will now find out what is going on in Finland’s national foresight network, who the contributors are, and how you can get involved. The new website has what you need to start quenching your thirst for foresight and futures consciousness: blog posts,...
creator: Kansallinen Ennakointiverkosto
